ui.panel.config.areas.caption: Apgabali
ui.panel.config.areas.picker.introductio: Apgabali tiek izmantoti, lai organizētu ierīces atrašanās vietu. Šī informācija tiks izmantota daudzviet Home Assistant, lai palīdzētu organizēt lietotāja saskarni, atļaujas un integrācijas ar citām sistēmām.
Lai piesaistītu ierīces noteiktam apgabalam, izmantojiet zemāk esošo saiti, lai pārietu uz integrāciju lapu un tad noklikšķiniet uz konfigurētas integrācijas, lai nonāktu pie ierīču kartīšu saraksta.

ui.panel.config.energy.grid.title: Elektrotīkls
ui.panel.config.energy.grid.sub: Configure the amount of energy that you consume from the grid and, if you produce energy, give back to the grid. This allows Home Assistant to track your whole home energy usage.
ui.panel.config.energy.grid.learn_more: More information on how to get started.
Grid consumption is the energy that flows from the energy grid to your home.
Select how Home Assistant should keep track of the costs of the consumed energy.
Use an entity tracking the total costs
Grid production is the energy that flows from your solar panels to the grid.
Do you get money back when you return energy to the grid?
Use an entity tracking the total recieved money
Use an entity with current rate
ui.panel.config.energy.solar.title: Saules paneļi
ui.panel.config.energy.solar.sub: Let Home Assistant monitor your solar panels and give you insight on their performance.
ui.panel.config.energy.solar.learn_more: More information on how to get started.
ui.panel.config.energy.solar.stat_predic: Prediction of your solar energy production
ui.panel.config.energy.solar.dialog.head: Saules paneļu konfigurēšana
ui.panel.config.energy.solar.dialog.sola: Adding solar production forecast information will allow you to quickly see your expected production for today.
ui.panel.config.energy.battery.title: Mājas akumulatoru krātuve
ui.panel.config.energy.battery.sub: If you have a battery system, you can configure it to monitor how much energy was stored and used from your battery.
ui.panel.config.energy.battery.learn_mor: Vairāk informācijas par to, kā sākt.

ui.panel.config.automation.caption: Automatizācijas
ui.panel.config.automation.picker.introd: Automatizācijas redaktors ļauj jums izveidot un rediģēt automatizācijas. Lūdzu, sekojiet saitei zemāk, lai pārliecinātos, ka esat pareizi konfigurējis Home Assistant.

ui.panel.config.automation.picker.dev_on: Only automations that have a unique ID assigned are debuggable.

ui.panel.config.automation.dialog_new.th: And we will try to create it for you. For example: Turn the lights off when I leave.

ui.panel.config.cloud.description_featur: Kontrolējiet prom no mājām, integrējieties ar Alexa un Google Assistant.
ui.panel.config.cloud.login.title: Cloud Login
ui.panel.config.cloud.login.introduction: Home Assistant Cloud provides you with a secure remote connection to your instance while away from home. It also allows you to connect with cloud-only services: Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant.
This service is run by our partner
, a company founded by the founders of Home Assistant.
Home Assistant Cloud is a subscription service with a free one month trial. No payment information necessary.
ui.panel.config.cloud.login.learn_more_l: Learn more about Home Assistant Cloud
ui.panel.config.cloud.login.password_err: Parolei ir jābūt vismaz 8 rakstzīmju garai
ui.panel.config.cloud.login.alert_passwo: Pirms pieteikšanās jums ir jānomaina sava parole.
ui.panel.config.cloud.login.alert_email_: Pirms pieteikšanās jums jāapstiprina savs e-pasts.
ui.panel.config.cloud.forgot_password.in: Enter your email address and we will send you a link to reset your password.
ui.panel.config.cloud.forgot_password.ch: Check your email for instructions on how to reset your password.
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.title: Register Account
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.headline: Sāciet savu bezmaksas izmēģinājuma periodu
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.informati: Create an account to start your free one month trial with Home Assistant Cloud. No payment information necessary.
The trial will give you access to all the benefits of Home Assistant Cloud, including:
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.feature_r: Control of Home Assistant away from home
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.feature_w: Easy integration with webhook-based apps like OwnTracks
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.informati: This service is run by our partner
, a company founded by the founders of Home Assistant.
By registering an account you agree to the following terms and conditions.
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.password_: Parolei ir jābūt vismaz 8 rakstzīmju garai
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.account_c: Account created! Check your email for instructions on how to activate your account.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.thank_you_: Thank you for being part of Home Assistant Cloud. It's because of people like you that we are able to make a great home automation experience for everyone. Thank you!
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.sign_out_c: Are you sure you want to sign out?
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.integratio: Integrations for Home Assistant Cloud allow you to connect with services in the cloud without having to expose your Home Assistant instance publicly on the internet.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.tts.title: Text to Speech
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.tts.info: Bring personality to your home by having it speak to you by using our Text-to-Speech services. You can use this in automations and scripts by using the {service} service.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.tts.dialog: Hello {name}, you can play any text on any supported media player!
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.remote.rec: Nav savienots. Mēģina atkārtoti izveidot savienojumu.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.remote.acc: Remote control is being prepared. We will notify you when it's ready.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.remote.inf: Home Assistant Cloud provides a secure remote connection to your instance while away from home.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.remote.ins: Your instance is available at your
Your instance will be available at your
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.alexa.info: With the Alexa integration for Home Assistant Cloud you'll be able to control all your Home Assistant devices via any Alexa-enabled device.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.alexa.enab: Enable the Home Assistant skill for Alexa
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.alexa.info: If you enable state reporting, Home Assistant will send all state changes of exposed entities to Amazon. This allows you to always see the latest states in the Alexa app and use the state changes to create routines.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.alexa.not_: Before you can use Alexa, you need to activate the Home Assistant skill for Alexa in the Alexa app.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.inf: With the Google Assistant integration for Home Assistant Cloud you'll be able to control all your Home Assistant devices via any Google Assistant-enabled device.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.htt: Google devices will not be able to talk locally with Home Assistant because you have configured an SSL certificate for your HTTP integration.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.ena: Activate the Home Assistant Cloud skill for Google Assistant
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.inf: If you enable state reporting, Home Assistant will send all state changes of exposed entities to Google. This speeds up voice commands and allows you to always see the latest states in the Google app.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.ent: Please enter a PIN to interact with security devices. Security devices are doors, garage doors and locks. You will be asked to say/enter this PIN when interacting with such devices via Google Assistant.
Enter a PIN to use security devices
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.not: Before you can use Google Assistant, you need to activate the Home Assistant Cloud skill for Google Assistant in the Google Home app.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.webhooks.i: Anything that is configured to be triggered by a webhook can be given a publicly accessible URL to allow you to send data back to Home Assistant from anywhere, without exposing your instance to the internet.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.webhooks.n: Looks like you have no webhooks yet. Get started by configuring a

ui.panel.config.entities.caption: Vienības
ui.panel.config.entities.picker.introduc: Home Assistant uztur visu vienību reģistru, kuras jebkad parādījušās un kuras var unikāli identificēt. Katrai no šīm vienībām piešķirts vienības ID, kas tiks rezervēts tikai šai vienībai.
Izmantojiet vienību reģistru, lai pārlabotu nosaukumu, mainītu vienības ID vai noņemtu ierakstu no Home Assistant.
ui.panel.config.entities.picker.enable_s: Tas atkārtoti padarīs tās pieejamas Home Assistant, ja tās šobrīd ir atspējotas.
ui.panel.config.entities.picker.disable_: Atspējotās vienības netiks pievienotas Home Assistant.
ui.panel.config.entities.picker.remove_s: Jums vajadzētu noņemt tos no Lovelace konfigurācijām un automatizācijām, ja tie satur šīs vienības.

You can only remove {removable} of the selected {selected} entities. Entities can only be removed when the integration is no longer providing the entities. Sometimes you have to restart Home Assistant before you can remove the entities of a removed integration. Are you sure you want to remove the removable entities?
ui.panel.config.entities.picker.hide_sel: Hidden entities will not be shown on your dashboard. Their history is still tracked and you can still interact with them with services.
ui.panel.config.person.caption: Personas
ui.panel.config.person.description: Pārvaldīt personas, kuras izseko Home Assistant.
ui.panel.config.person.introduction: Šeit jūs varat definēt personas izmantošanai Home Assistant.
ui.panel.config.person.note_about_person: Ievērībai: configuration.yaml konfigurētās personas nevar rediģēt, izmantojot lietotāja saskarni.
ui.panel.config.person.no_persons_create: Izskatās, ka vēl neesat izveidojis nevienu personu.
ui.panel.config.person.confirm_delete_te: This person will be permanently deleted and all devices belonging to this person will become unassigned.
ui.panel.config.person.person_not_found: Mēs nevarējām atrast personu, kuru mēģinājāt rediģēt.
ui.panel.config.person.detail.name: Vārds
ui.panel.config.person.detail.device_tra: Atlasiet ierīces, kas pieder šai personai.
ui.panel.config.person.detail.no_device_: Ja jums ir ierīces, kas norāda uz personas klātbūtni, jūs šeit varēsit tās piesaistīt personai. Pirmo ierīci varat pievienot, integrāciju lapā pievienojot klātbūtnes noteikšanas integrāciju.
ui.panel.config.person.detail.confirm_de: Vai tiešām vēlaties dzēst lietotāja {name} kontu? Jūs joprojām varat izsekot lietotāju, taču persona vairs nevarēs pieteikties.
ui.panel.config.person.detail.local_only: Can only log in from the local network
ui.panel.config.zone.caption: Zonas
ui.panel.config.zone.description: Pārvaldiet zonas, kurās vēlaties izsekot personām.
ui.panel.config.zone.introduction: Zonas ļauj norādīt noteiktus reģionus uz zemes. Kad cilvēks atrodas zonā, vienības stāvoklim tiks izmantots zonas nosaukums. Zonas var izmantotas kā aktivators vai nosacījums automatizācijās.
ui.panel.config.zone.no_zones_created_ye: Izskatās, ka vēl neesat izveidojis nevienu zonu.
ui.panel.config.zone.confirm_delete: Vai tiešām vēlaties dzēst šo zonu?
ui.panel.config.zone.configured_in_yaml: configuration.yaml konfigurētās zonas nevar rediģēt, izmantojot lietotāja saskarni.
ui.panel.config.zone.edit_home_zone: Mājas zonas rādiusu pagaidām nevar rediģēt, izmantojot lietotāja saskarni. Velciet marķieri kartē, lai pārvietotu mājas zonu.
ui.panel.config.zone.edit_home_zone_narr: Mājas zonas rādiusu pagaidām nevar rediģēt, izmantojot lietotāja saskarni. Atrašanās vietu var mainīt no vispārējās konfigurācijas.
ui.panel.config.zone.home_zone_core_conf: Jūsu mājas zonas atrašanās vietu var rediģēt no vispārējās konfigurācijas lapas. Mājas zonas rādiusu pagaidām nevar rediģēt, izmantojot lietotāja saskarni. Vai vēlaties pāriet uz vispārīgo konfigurāciju?
ui.panel.config.zone.detail.name: Nosaukums
ui.panel.config.zone.detail.passive_note: Pasīvās zonas netiek rādītas lietotāja saskarnē un netiek izmantotas kā atrašanās vieta ierīču izsekošanai. Tas ir noderīgi, ja vēlaties tās izmantot tikai automatizācijai.
ui.panel.config.integrations.caption: Integrācijas
ui.panel.config.integrations.description: Pārvaldiet integrācijas ar servisiem vai ierīcēm
ui.panel.config.integrations.no_integrat: Šķiet, ka jums pagaidām nav nokonfigurēta neviena integrācija. Noklikšķiniet uz pogas zemāk, lai pievienotu savu pirmo integrāciju!
ui.panel.config.integrations.note_about_: Neviena integrācija neatbilst meklēšanas kritērijiem. Integrācija, kuru vēlaties iestatīt, pagaidām var neatbalstīt iestatīšanu, izmantojot lietotāja saskarni.
ui.panel.config.integrations.ignore.conf: Vai tiešām nevēlaties iestatīt šo integrāciju? To varat atsaukt, augšējā labajā stūrī noklikšķinot uz “Rādīt ignorētās integrācijas” pārpildes izvēlnē.
Tas ļaus integrācijai atkal parādīties starp atklātajām integrācijām. Atklāšanai var būt nepieciešama restartēšana vai nepieciešams ilgāks laiks.
ui.panel.config.integrations.config_entr: Would you like to also remove Application Credentials for this integration?

If you remove them, you will need to enter credentials when setting up the integration again. If you keep them, they will be used automatically when setting up the integration again or may be acccessed from the Application Credentials menu.
Its devices and entities will be permanently deleted.
Restartēt Home Assistant, lai pabeigtu šīs integrācijas noņemšanu
Restartējiet Home Assistant, lai pabeigtu šīs integrācijas pārlādēšanu
Restart Home Assistant to finish disabling this integration
Restart Home Assistant to finish enabling this integration
Its devices and entities will be disabled.
Enabling or disabling of the integration failed
Automatic polling for updated data disabled
ui.panel.config.integrations.config_flow: This device can not be added from the UI
You can add this device by adding it to your ''configuration.yaml''. See the documentation for more information.
This integration does not support configuration via the UI. If you followed this link from the Home Assistant website, make sure you run the latest version of Home Assistant.
Ne visi obligātie lauki ir aizpildīti.
Šī soļa pabeigšanai ir nepieciešams apmeklēt ārēju tīmekļa vietni.
Please wait, starting configuration wizard for {integration}
Config flow could not be loaded
The integration could not be loaded, try to restart Home Assistant.
Support for {supported_brand} devices is provided by {flow_domain_name}. Do you want to continue?
To add a {brand} device, you first need {supported_hardware_link} and the {integration} integration set up. If you already have the hardware then you can proceed with the setup of {integration}.
ui.panel.config.users.caption: Lietotāji
ui.panel.config.users.users_privileges_n: Lietotāju grupa ir izstrādes procesā. Lietotājs nevarēs administrēt instalāciju, izmantojot lietotāja saskarni. Mēs joprojām pārbaudām pārvaldības API, lai pārliecinātos, ka tie pareizi ierobežo piekļuvi administratoriem.
ui.panel.config.users.editor.caption: Skatīt lietotāju
ui.panel.config.users.editor.name: Vārds
ui.panel.config.users.editor.confirm_use: This user will be permanently deleted.
ui.panel.config.users.add_user.caption: Lietotāja pievienošana
ui.panel.config.users.change_password.pa: The password has been changed successfully.
Manage the OAuth Application Credentials used by Integrations

OAuth is used to grant Home Assistant access to information on other websites without giving a passwords. This mechanism is used by companies such as Spotify, Google, Withings, Microsoft, and Twitter.
Setting up {integration} requires configuring application credentials.
Public identifier of the OAuth application
Application Credentials in use by an integration may not be removed.

ui.panel.config.zha.add_device_page.pair: Make sure your devices are in pairing mode. Check the instructions of your device on how to do this.
ui.panel.config.zha.add_device_page.disc: Devices will show up here once discovered.
ui.panel.config.zha.add_device_page.no_d: No devices were found, make sure they are in pairing mode and keep them awake while Home Assistant is searching.

ui.panel.config.zha.groups.group_details: Here are all the details for the selected Zigbee group.
ui.panel.config.zha.groups.create_group_: Enter the required details to create a new Zigbee group
ui.panel.config.zha.group_binding.group_: Select a group to issue a bind command.
ui.panel.config.zha.group_binding.cluste: Select clusters to bind to the selected group.
ui.panel.config.zha.group_binding.bind_b: Bind the selected group to the selected device clusters.

ui.panel.config.zwave_js.common.in_progr: Z-Wave JS is searching for devices
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.dashboard.intro: Manage your Z-Wave network and Z-Wave devices
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.dashboard.stati: Number of messages successfully sent to the controller
Number of messages successfully received by the controller
Number of messages from the controller that were dropped by the host
Number of outgoing messages that were dropped because they could not be sent
Number of messages that the controller did not accept
Number of collisions while sending a message to the controller
Number of transmission attempts where an ACK was missing from the controller
Number of transmission attempts where the controller response did not come in time
Number of transmission attempts where the controller callback did not come in time
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.node_statistics: # of commands successfully sent to the node
# of commands received from the node, including responses to sent commands
# of outgoing commands that were dropped because they could not be sent
# of commands from the node that were dropped by the host
# of Get-type commands where the node's response did not come in time
Average round-trip-time in ms of commands to this node
Average RSSI in dBm of frames received by this node
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.route_statistic: The used data rate for this route
Which nodes are repeaters for this route and their RSSI
The RSSI of the ACK frame received by the controller
The nodes between which the transmission failed most recently
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.node_config.int: Manage and adjust device specific configuration parameters for the selected device
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.node_config.att: Device configuration parameters and descriptions are provided by the {device_database}
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.node_config.bat: Battery devices must be awake to update their config. Please refer to your device manual for instructions on how to wake the device.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.node_config.set: The parameter change has been queued, and will be updated when the device wakes up.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.add_node.title: Add a Z-Wave Device
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.add_node.follow: Follow the directions that came with your device to trigger pairing on the device.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.add_node.choose: How do you want to add your device
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.add_node.qr_cod: If your device supports SmartStart you can scan the QR code for easy pairing.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.add_node.inclus: The device could not be added.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.add_node.check_: Please check the logs for more information.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.add_node.provis: The device has been added. Once you power it on, it will become available.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.add_node.interv: The device is being interviewed. This may take some time.
The device interview failed. Additional information may be available in the logs.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.provisioned.con: Are you sure you want to unprovision the device?

If you unprovision the device it will not be added to Home Assistant when it is powered on. If it is already added to Home Assistant, removing the provisioned device will not remove it from Home Assistant.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.security_classe: Like S2 Authenticated, but without verification that the correct device is included
Example: Lighting, Sensors and Security Systems
Example: Door Locks and Garage Doors
Example: Legacy Door Locks without S2 support
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.remove_node.int: Remove a device from your Z-Wave network, and remove the associated device and entities from Home Assistant.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.remove_node.con: Your Z-Wave controller is now in exclusion mode.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.remove_node.fol: Follow the directions that came with your device to trigger exclusion on the device.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.remove_node.exc: The device could not be removed. Please check the logs for more information.
Device {id} has been removed from your Z-Wave network.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.remove_failed_n: Remove a failed device from your Z-Wave network. Use this if you are unable to exclude a device normally because it is broken.
The device removal is in progress.
Device {id} has been removed from your Z-Wave network.
Ierīci nevarēja noņemt no jūsu Z-Wave tīkla.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.reinterview_nod: Re-interview a device on your Z-Wave network. Use this feature if your device has missing or incorrect functionality.
You will need to wake battery powered devices before starting the re-interview. Refer to your device's manual for instructions on how to wake the device.
You can close this dialog and the interview will continue in the background.
The device is being interviewed. This may take some time.
The device interview failed. Additional information may be available in the logs.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.heal_network.in: Start a network heal on your Z-Wave network. A network heal will cause all devices to re-calculate their routes back to the controller and is recommended if you have recently moved devices or your controller.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.heal_network.tr: The healing process generates a large amount of traffic on the Z-Wave network. This may cause devices to respond slowly (or not at all) while the heal is in progress.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.heal_network.in: Network healing is in progress. This will take some time.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.heal_network.ru: You can close this dialog and the network healing will continue in the background.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.heal_network.he: Healing failed. Additional information may be available in the logs.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.heal_node.title: Heal a Z-Wave Device
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.heal_node.intro: Tell {device} to update its routes back to the controller. This can help with communication issues if you have recently moved the device or your controller.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.heal_node.traff: The healing process generates a large amount of traffic on the Z-Wave network. This may cause devices to respond slowly (or not at all) while the heal is in progress.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.heal_node.heali: Additional information may be available in the logs.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.heal_node.netwo: A Z-Wave network heal is already in progress. Please wait for it to finish before healing an individual device.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.update_firmware: WARNING: Firmware updates can brick your device if you do not correctly follow the manufacturer's guidance. The Home Assistant and Z-Wave JS teams do not take any responsibility for any damages to your device as a result of the firmware update and will not be able to help you if you brick your device. Would you still like to continue?
Select the firmware file you would like to use to update {device}.
Select the firmware target (0 for the Z-Wave chip, ≥1 for other chips if they exist) for this update, or uncheck the box to have the driver attempt to figure it out from the firmware file.
The firmware update is ready to be sent to {device} but the device is asleep, wake the device to start the update.
If you close this dialog, the update will continue to be queued in the background and start automatically once the device wakes up.
The firmware update should start being sent to {device} shortly.
If you close this dialog, the update will continue in the background.
The firmware update on {device} is in progress ({progress}%).
Are you sure you want to abort the firmware update on {device}?
To attempt the firmware update again, select the new firmware file you would like to use.
The firmware update is complete! If you want to attempt another firmware update on this device, please wait until it gets re-interviewed.
